attributes.action: DWP P.I.P. reviews into individual based & seperate Physical/Mental disability.
attributes.additional_details: I feel the suicide rate is not always necessarily in relation to loss of money, but lack of compassion, and being unfairly treated by the ruling of the country. This must change, how many more precious lives before responsibility is owned? And what for? The bonus packet - for figures of rejected claims. Cherry picking, and choosing holes to gather evidence against the vunerable, disabled and suffering is immoral. Do you agree? Mental handicap is not in association with physical.
attributes.background: Many lives have been ruined and lost due to the scrutinising eye and systematic rejection from DWP fitness for work. Repeatedley stated 'It is the daily effect not the diagnosis' in many cases, with a score judgement system gathering inproper, unfair evidence. Leading to brutally felt rejection.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about the experiences that people have when claiming PIP, but we're not sure exactly what you mean by "DWP P.I.P. reviews into individual based & seperate Physical/Mental disability". 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
